exceptions.tactic: destruct x as [a| |]; destruct y as [b| |].

exceptions.exn: The reference a was not found in the current environment.

original: intros x y H. unfold Rbar_locally. destruct x as [a| |]; destruct y as [b| |]. - simpl in H. apply locally_interval with (a:=a) (b:=b). + apply Rbar_lt_trans with (b := b); trivial. + intros z Hz1 Hz2. apply Hz2. - exists 0. intros z Hz. apply open_Rbar_lt; auto. - contradiction. - exists 0. intros z Hz. apply open_Rbar_lt; auto. - exists 0. intros z Hz. apply open_Rbar_lt; auto. - contradiction.
